headline: Delta and Siemens to Complement their Power Solutions to Help Customers Cut Data Center Deployment Time, Costs, and Carbon Emissions
summary: Delta, a global leader in power management and smart green solutions, and Siemens Smart Infrastructure have formalized a global partnership to deliver prefabricated, modular power solutions designed to accelerate the deployment of data center infrastructure, while significantly reducing CAPEX. The partnership will ensure hyperscale and colocation operators enjoy a strategic advantage in the competitive AI and cloud computing data center market, with the highest performance in power management an
